Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui.panels

Contains classes related to GuiPanels which can be added to the framework's GUI to display particular information.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
GuiPanel A GUI Panel which can be displayed in the FrameworkGui
 

Class Summary
ActionSelectionPanel A GuiPanel which displays the current Behavior elements in the ActionSelection module.
ActivationChartPanel A GuiPanel which displays a Learnable element's activation over time (in ticks).
AddEditPanel Allows users to add and edit GuiPanels from the main FrameworkGui
ConfigurationFilesPanel A GuiPanel displaying the configuration files being used.
ControlToolBarPanel Implements the tool bar of the FrameworkGui.
FrameworkTaskPanel A GuiPanel which displays the FrameworkTasks which are controlled by the TaskSpawner associated with a particular FrameworkModule.
GlobalWorkspaceTablePanel This is a Panel which shows all current coalitions in Global Workspace and also the most recent broadcast.
GuiPanelImpl Abstract implementation of GuiPanel Panels that extend this class inherit the 'initPanel()' method.
LoggingPanel A GuiPanel to display the logs of the system.
NodeStructurePanel A GuiPanel which creates a graphical view of a NodeStructure.
NodeStructureTable A GuiPanel which displays the attributes of a NodeStructure in a table.
ProceduralMemoryPanel A GuiPanel to display the Scheme elements of ProceduralMemory
TaskQueuePanel A GuiPanel which displays the current queue of tasks scheduled for execution in TaskManager.
 

Package edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.gui.panels Description

Contains classes related to GuiPanels which can be added to the framework's GUI to display particular information.
